topic: 16. When can selected common process framework activities be omitted during process decomposition?
options: when the project is extremely small in size
any time the software is mission critical
rapid prototyping does not require their use
topic_cn: 16. 在进行过程分解时，何时可以省略选定的通用过程框架活动？
options_cn: 只要软件是关键任务型的
快速原型开发不需要使用它们
从不，这些活动是不可变的
